original_title: Balada Das Duas Mocinhas De Botafogo
overview: Two sisters try to find meaning in their empty lives through sexual experiences and adventures in the nightlife of Rio de Janeiro. Abandoned by their father, who left their family, and raised by their absent mother, the two sisters rely on each other and search for their own path, trying to find a way out. Based on the poem from Vinicus de Moraes.
title: Balada Das Duas Mocinhas De Botafogo
